meta.content:
COVID-19 Information
There are many sites with information on the new COVID-19 Virus. We are trying to get to you, the best and most current information on this site. We will be keeping this site up-to-date as well.
If you have any questions, please contact the School at 402-923-1230
This is our staff contact sheet. Please...

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:56 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph becoming north northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

A slight chance of showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 74. Calm wind becoming south around 6 mph in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:56 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph becoming north northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

A slight chance of showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 74. Calm wind becoming south around 6 mph in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

td.h4:
There are many sites with information on the new COVID-19 Virus.
We are trying to get to you, the best and most current information on this site.
We will be keeping this site up-to-date as well.
If you have any questions, please contact the School at 402-923-1230

div.p: This is our staff contact sheet. Please reference it when contacting our staff!

p.a: Click HERE For notes from the Administrator.

p.br: Click each note for more info
